text: The Colombian Roller Hockey Championship is the biggest Roller Hockey Clubs Championship in Colombia. The most recent winner is M.H.C, team from Manizales. ==Participated Teams in the last Season== # SUPER PATÍN # MIMBRE # MANIZALES H.C. # INTERNACIONAL # F.C.M.
